casinoInfo.title: Top gaming venue in Birmingham
casinoInfo.name: Resorts World Casino
features: A haven casino with over +100 games
Outdoor terrace with amazing views to Pendigo Lake
Boasting its signature casino’s Sports Bar
Smart casual is welcome as dress code
Guaranteed a warm and friendly service

descriptions.mainDescription: Ideally located just minutes from Birmingham’s Airport, the Resorts World Casino is considered a slot machine haven with over 100 slot machines, and one of the largest casinos in the UK. It is simply your best option for your gaming entertainment and a memorable night out in Birmingham.
descriptions.secondaryDescription: Those looking for gaming action the Resorts World Casino is full with live table games like roulette, blackjack, poker and more. Boasting mouth-watering steaks, grazing plates and international dishes. Including a lively Sports Bar with mouth watering dishes, a sports café and bustling bar to sip fresh drinks.

casinoInfo.standOut: Amazing views & plenty of casino games
